limitation_of_liability.unacceptable: Less than 12 months or no cap
limitation_of_liability.rationale: Need adequate protection for enterprise deployments where damages could be substantial

payment_terms.rationale: Cash flow management and standard business practice

data_ownership.preferred: Customer owns all data, vendor has no rights
data_ownership.acceptable: Customer owns data, vendor has limited license for service delivery only
data_ownership.unacceptable: Vendor owns data or has broad usage rights
data_ownership.rationale: Data privacy, regulatory compliance, competitive protection

term_and_renewal.unacceptable: >3 year initial term or >5 year renewals, >120 day notice
term_and_renewal.rationale: Flexibility to change vendors if needed
